page.title: 10CHRISTIAN CHURCHES:ST.ALBANS
page.content: A Christian is a person who follows the teaching of Jesus Christ.There are five christian churches in our area. The two{Anglican}churches are St. Paul's, Fleetville and St. Mary's, Sherwood Ave. The vicar of St. Mary's is Mr. Wright. The{Baptist Church}is in Sherwood Ave.The Minister is Mr. Plumb. The{United Reformed church}is in Homewood Rd. The Minister is Mr. Starky. The{Roman Catholic Community has a Mass Centre at St. John Fisher School in Hazelmere Rd. It is part of the parish of Ss. Alban & Stephen. All the churches said that they would like their church to be remembered in different ways. But mainly that people came together and found peace and happiness through following Jesus.
